long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Web lets you experience richer web browsing by giving you useful widgets directly from your tabs.

Some of the features include: 

- Latest news from BBC, The Guardian and Daily Mail
- Current weather conditions and forecasts in your city
- 10 most popular UK radio stations available for listening
- Latest news in your local area
- Shortcuts to the UK's most popular websites
- Health widgets
- Current time and date
- Latest news in sports, football, entertainment, tech and more
- Custom shortcuts for your favourite websites

and much more...
